existing_features.title: Update the ShareModal component and/or the share/publish button in the Header and Footer to improve its appearance, copy, or behavior as directed by the user. Clarify with the user what specific change is needed (e.g., button label, modal content, QR code URL, link copy, styling), and apply the agreed update consistently across all locations where the share/publish trigger appears (Header and Footer).

projectName: Update the Share/Publish modal or button
